content: LONDON  March 14 British employers plan to hire staff at the slowest pace in three years because of uncertainty about the country's exit from the European Union  a survey by recruiting firm Manpower showed on Tuesday.    "The companies which have powered Britain's economy through the immediate post-referendum period are easing off the gas " Mark Cahill  ManpowerGroup's UK managing director  said.
name: ManpowerGroup
title: UK firms scale back on hiring plans ahead of Brexit - Manpower
